page.title: 14POLICE SERVICE
page.content:
Ballymoney Police Station is situated in Charlotte Street. There are two parts to the building - one on each side of the road. The{Petty Sessions {Court}is an integral part of the older building.
Their strength is approximately 140 constables, 3 detectives and one other from{C.I.D.}together with part-time help from{Coleraine}whose sub-division they are in.
Ballymoney has{no Traffic Wardens! The main problems in the area are break-ins and petty thieving.
The Police arrange discos,hikes, ramble schemes etc. to aid{public {relations}.
